data.title: First, save what you have, community housing panel tells Northwest Arkansas group
data.meta_description: The bridge park -- an elevated park built on the piers of a bridge -- grew out of a decade-old effort led by residents of that community to preserve their neighborhood. Other panelists were: Scott Kratz, senior vice president of the nonprofit company Building Bridges Across the River, and Vaughn Perry, director of the Skyland Workforce Center in the Anacostia community. - Arkansas Democrat Gazette
